content.detailedDescription: At 3 a.M. i walked outside on my front porch for a cigarette break.Always looking at the stars.Lo and behold there it was! straight out ahead of me .First i thought its probably mercury, then i realized it had brighter lights then usual and more colors coming through than usual. i always ask my guy where mercuryis.It was visible 4 at least 45 minutes and slowly moved awaymore west. multi colors lights flashing and pulsing. anyway, saw it at pill size for 2 minutes, got binoculars and flipped out and ran and woke up my guy.He came out and said it was mercury at first, then ask me what time it was.I said 3am and he was very quiet while looking through binoculars. he said mercury isnt visible at 3.He saw the multi colors and a shapelike a capsule. we both watched it slowly move out of sight.This is our 3rd time and 3rd object spotted standing on our porch or front yard.All 3 different.Wish i had a good video cam!!
content.summary: Smoke break 3 am

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in the dark nearing midnight in late summer and i witnessed an object that was round in its shape like a sphere and appeared as it were on fire in color. this object gave no sound or smell nor had in conventional aircraft characteristics. it moved at a steady pace and never wavered in direction or altitude. this object was absolutely close enough to have heard any engine sounds or even rotor sounds including those rigged to run quietly. there was no way to detect it was even there unless you happen to see it. i have inquired about objects before to local authorities and was dismissed as nothing to report. this is not the first and as i have seen some pretty strange sightings that defies aircraft capabilities on several occasions i hope someone can figure out what these objects are.
content.summary: Sitting outside in dark and object was observed i have never seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking some pictures from my bedroom window with my galaxy s4 .
to my surprise i realized id actually taken a picture of ufo.
the tree that the object is behind is about 75 feet behind the lamp post.
lamp post is 120 feet away
 please can you analyse .
content.summary: I was taking a picture from my bedroom window and found a ufo present

content.detailedDescription:
I was in calico, ca to go hiking in the mountain pass by the calico ghost town. 




when i got to the top of the mountain pass i thought the view was really nice so i took a quick snap shot.




when i reviewed the picture i thought i had a dirt smudge and when i wiped the digital camera screen the spot didn't leave.  




when me i looked back up the object didn't appear to be there anymore.  




when i got back home in placentia, ca i loaded the picture on my computer and saw this ufo that is in plain sight and also realized i was the only person who saw this flying object on the other side of the mountain where there are no cities or streets for miles.

i have been skeptical in the past and when my friend informed me that there are many others who have also seen ufo's i just had to take the opportunity to let you know my first encounter experience.




i am a united states navy veteran of 9 years and never did i think i would ever in a million years see a flying object in plain sight at the calico desert mountain pass.
content.summary: The truth is out there!!

content.detailedDescription: The first thing that made me see it was the size of this thing. it was easily 1/2 mile wide from tip to tip. it was lit with colors that didn't seem to make sense in terms of clearance lights. the body was black or dark, but lit with beautiful colors. alongside the right tip was a large multiple engine jet aircraft. i could hear the engines and see the clearance lights. the apparent travel route was from northwest to southeast. the object itself made no noise whatsoever. they moved fast and were gone before i could take a picture. i knew that what i was seeing was not anything in the known arsenal. certainly not any of the "stealth" aircraft that had been revealed in recent times.
content.summary: Large lit boomerang flew overhead with large jet flying next to it.

content.detailedDescription:
At ft. benning-night shift-4 of us saw a star that appeared brighter than any other star-for the fun of it someone flashed the old army flashlight toward it. we were completely surprised to see that bright "star" drop straight down a bit of a distance and come to a complete halt.
we freaked out a bit with fear and curiosity and turned the flashlight off; in that instant this "star" went straight back up to where is was when we first saw it. 
if with abated breath and fear we couldn't believe what we saw so we turned the flasuht back on - again it did the exact same thing it did the first time.
that was all we could take - never did it again and vowed to never speak if it again.  that was in 1974.
content.summary: Bright light among stars; turned on army flashlight-object rapidly moved straight down; turned light off-object moved rapidly straight up; same 2nd time!

content.detailedDescription: At 10:20 i was taking garbage out. a fireworks display had just ended 10 minutes ago. there were no other fireworks going off at the time. i noticed orb tear drop-like object at about 45 degrees in the sw sky. i noticed it because it wasn't blinking. no landing lights, navigation lights, etc. i thought it reminded me of a japanese lantern. but i have never seen one in person and have to frame of reference other than from what i have seen on tv. the object seemed to be maintaining an altitude between 500-1000 feet moving from se to nw. speed had to be 300-500 knots. it vibrated or shook as it moved in a starlight line. kinda shimmered. object finally disappeared over treeline. the whole event lasted between 1 and 2 mins.
content.summary: Orb/tear-drop-like traveling above grosse pointe woods mi apporx 10:20 est. no blinking, steady orange glow.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of june 25th, at 10:40 pm, i was standing on the balcony of the sands beach club resort on the 8th floor located in north myrtle beach s.C. my three friends also saw this event. we saw groups of small round red-orange lights appearing in the southeastern sky over the atlantic ocean multiple times. the first group of lights we saw in a group of two whereby the first light appeared and then separated into a second light. both lights appeared for only about 3-4 seconds and then faded. the second group of lights had three lights whereby the first light appeared and then slowly faded while the second light appeared as the first one faded. when the second light faded a third light appeared. all three lights were on a straight linear plane and appeared to be equal distance from each other. the time it took for this sequence to happen was about 4-5 seconds. this same sequence of three lights appearing and fading happened three more times in different positions in the sky but all taking place on the eastern horizon over the atlantic ocean. the whole event of five different groups of lights (one group of two and four groups of three) fading on and fading off took approximately 10-15 minutes and was over by 11pm. the apparent distance between each of the light sightings was significant in that in my opinion, it would not have been possible for any man made aircraft to move that far on the horizon that quickly. the size of the lights were also much bigger than that of a commercial airplane and did not flash as commercial planes normally do. the lights just faded on and faded out. no two lights were in the exact same position in the sky other than the first group of two where it appeared the second light cam from the first light. i believe there were other sightings of this same event on this same day at this same time by others who did take pictures and whose pictures were posted on the mufon web site. i was not able to take pictures but can confirm those pictures are the exact same event we witnessed.
content.summary: Round symmetrical red-orange lights appeared in groups of 2 and 3, four to five times.

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out my apartment to see if it was sunny yet
it had been super cloudy all day..I looked up cause a strange shine caught my eyes..
i noticed a white disc spinning circles and flying up and down going up high
and dropping down and coming back up..It stopped for a second
angled and shot into a cloud below it and then back up and vanished
i reached for my phone to get my camera on but it was gone as i aimed my phone
content.summary: White disc flying up and down crazy

content.detailedDescription:
Hola: estas dos fotos fueron tomadas con una diferencia de algunos segundos, en la parte izquierda de la luna se ven como unas luces de una aeronave, lo curioso es que no tenemos trafico a������������������reo en esta zona, esto es en san pedro, un pueblito de la isla de la palma canarias, me di cuenta al visualizar las fotos en el ordenador, quiz������������������s sea alg������������������n reflejo de la c������������������mara del telefono m������������������vil. samsung s 4. las fotos son tomadas con diferencia de 2 segundos
saludos.
oscar perez castro
content.summary: No se lo que es.

content.detailedDescription: Eran las 22:00. todav������a hab������a luz. yo estaba tendiendo la ropa cuando vi en el cielo una luz que dejaba una estela tras de s������. al principio cre������ que se trataba de un b������lido (meteorito), pero de pronto la luz y la estela desaparecieron y el objeto pas������ a ser una simple l������nea gris en el cielo que volaba de manera constante. continu������ surcando el cielo hasta desaparecer, manteniendo siempre el mismo rumbo y velocidad.
content.summary: Al principio parecía un meteorito, que pasó a convertirse en una línea gris que volaba horizontalmente.

content.detailedDescription:
1. we are birthday party in restaurant terrace 
2. no. we found photo.
3. i  was surprised.
4. perfect triangle shape
5. i finally saw a ufo
6. no.
content.summary: Triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: During the evening of june 28, 2014 at approximately 9:45pm or a little later (2nd intermission of a show) at an entertainment event at 198 cherry blossom way, troy, missouri (w.L.W. headquarters/race arena) a brightly lit triangular object with yellow/orange pulsating light(s) appeared high in the sky in what i think would be the south east and flew directly over a fairly large group of people (35-40?) toward the north west and as it did so, it continued to pulsate bright lights and diminish in size before it suddenly vanished from sight. for a few fractions of a second here and there, it also slightly appeared to be made of flames or fire. the object moved rather slowly as several witnesses were given time to notice it and point it out to others and make various excited comments about it. a friend and i were standing at the far end of the parking lot near our car approximately 100 yards from the entrance of the large building where most of the other event patrons were gathering during an intermission. my friend was facing away from the object when i first saw it. i immediately noticed that it was extremely bright and did not have the required red and green blinking lights on the sides/wings that would indicate an ordinary aircraft. i told my friend to hurry and turn around and look at the strange bright object in the sky behind him. as he saw it and commented on it, we both suddenly heard several younger people near the entrance of the building some 100 feet away also excitedly comment on this yellow/orange, pulsating, triangular flying object with "hey! look up there at that!" "what is that?" "wow! that might be a u.F.O.!" etc., etc. my friend and i both commented that whatever it is, we are not the only two people who can see it. the object changed in brightness and slightly in shape as it crossed into the north eastern sky and began to fade away. then it was suddenly gone leaving no smoke or emission trail or any evidence as to where it had been flying. the object flew far too slowly to be a simple "shooting star" or dust/sand particle scraping the edge of earth's atmosphere. the flight path of the brightly lit and pulsating triangular object seemed to be fairly straight and did not appear to change course too much. this thing we saw was in fact 1.) an object of some sort. 2.) the object was in fact moving on a steady course very high up in the sky, so it can be considered to be flying. --and 3.) we could not positively identify the object as to what exactly it was, therefore we concluded that it was indeed an unidentified flying object. i apologize for being so interested in keenly observing it's flight path and commenting on it that i forgot to reach for my phone and take a photo of it. both my friend and i are certain that we were not alone in observing this oddly behaving thing in the sky since we could hear other people and children at the event commenting on it from across the parking lot. once we all re-entered the arena, the event started back up again, so there was no chance to discuss what we saw with other patrons in attendance.
content.summary: Triangular object with pulsating light observed flying over then vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
1.Just before 2am,and right after watching a movie with my daughter, i went out on the back porch to allow our dog out. 

2. when i opened up the back door to the  porch, i saw 3 bright orange/red lights right away, they were big and it took me by surprise! 

3.I did not know what i was seeing. i had never seen anything like it. i ran back inside and yelled for my daughter to come quickly; then we waited to hear a sound as the 3 lights came closer. when no noise was heard, i told my daughter to quickly wake-up dad. 

4.My husband came quickly ,he was looking to see if the lights had a solid body connecting them, but the 3 of us could not see anything solid connecting the 3 basketball size red/orange glowing lights, stars could be seen between the distance of the 3 lights, and the stars looked tiny next to the lights. we watched the lights move in synch, it keep it's triangular shape, the lights were coming towards us getting bigger in size, coming from the east,southeast and moving slowing west, southwest. 

5. all 3 of us had feelings of amazement, our reactions were of shock and we were shouting while discussing the moving lights, and our action was to hurry and get a picture. then later, we worried we had woke up neighbors...

6. after about 5 minutes, and after the 3 lights moved west, southwest, all 3 lights went out at the same time.
content.summary: 3 noiseless, orange/red lights in a triangular shape, moving at a slow pace, flying lower than a f-18 in flight.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and i looked up about 50-60 degrees from myself and saw a plane-like object flying through the air with a light that pulsed every few seconds. i just assumed it was a plane until it stopped and all the lights came and stayed on for about 5 seconds. then, it flashed very brightly - almost like an explosion but controlled. it let out very bright beams of light and when they dwindled, the craft was gone. when it flashed it looked like a very bright star with an approximate diameter barely smaller than the moon on a normal night in the sky. i didn't get a chance to take a picture or video because i assumed it was a plane until it stopped and i didn't have enough time to take out my phone.
content.summary: Plane like object stopped in mid-air, hovered, then flashed brightly and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying out in my backyard looking at the stars. i caught something moving out of the corner of my eyes and looked in that direction. it was moving fast so i jumped up to get a better view. it was boomerang shaped and glowing. it seemed to be flying in a long arc. i felt a little shocked at first but later calmed down and was glad to have seen it. the object just faded in the distance.
content.summary: Laying in my backyard looking at the stars when the object passed by.

content.detailedDescription: 15.30hrs 28th of june 2014 at home address i was in the back garden sun bathing the sky was clear no cloud cover at all i observed 4 black tip seagulls flying directly above me as i observed the birds wheeling i noticed a bright starlight like object travelling north to south at extremely high speed and at high altitude. the object was in my unimpeded view for approximately 6-7 seconds before disappearing from sight over the horizon. the object maintained a constant speed and direction for the duration of the sighting, there was no noise i could associate with the object.
content.summary: Bright star light object travelling north to south at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: I've been unsure what to do with the photo i'm submitting today. it was taken on june 17th 2014, just a little before 6 pm. it certainly doesn't look like a bird, nor is it a plane, but assuming it's a ufo then it sure is an odd one. after finding similar looking objects in an old historical ufo photo, i finally decided to send along my photo with the historical one. this other photo was taken by an anonymous photographer, as the objects were seen over the cockaponset state forest, connecticut, on july 20 2005.  as with almost all of my other ufo photos, i saw nothing other than the background elements when taking the shot.
content.summary: Odd ufo similar to historic ufo images.

content.detailedDescription: My wife stepped outside just before 9 pm cdt and noticed orange glowing lights moving from south to north just above the eastern horizon (20 degrees or so) and called me to join her.  the glow was steady and uniform for each.  as i joined her, we could see more than 10 crossing the eastern sky - she indicated more had already moved out of sight.  in this larger grouping they were somewhat uniformly spaced out at generally 2 elevations and south to north (but not in a perfect line - they just followed a general path south to north).  trees were blocking our se view so as we watched we could see more of these lights emerge into view (almost due east) and head north.  we continued to see 1 and sometimes 2, at a time emerge into view on a regular basis for a total of about 15 minutes (i sent an email video at 9:17 after the last one passed).  we are sure we saw at least 20 and probably closer to 30 lights. lastly, as the lights moved north they seemed to disappear.  there were spotty low clouds and i could see their glow diminish as it moved into the clouds but the lights totally disappeared as they moved passed the ne line of sight (i assumed that if there were a light on the front of the craft that light would become obscured to us as it reached that point on its northerly course).  as another witness (in pa i think) noted, they gave the appearance of chinese lanterns moving across the sky. there were no blinking lights, just the steady glow. once the steady glow disappeared (was obscured?) we did not see an other lights (such as the blinking lights on an airplane or helicopter).  one other viewer noted that they seemed to be moving at a rate consistent with a small aircraft and i would agree except that we could not determine the distance to the lights (although based on our view of them moving into the clouds i would guess the distance to be on the order of 2 miles or so).  i did capture video toward the end of the viewing and the simply show small orange dots moving across the black night sky. in the video you can hear boats on the lake below our lake home - yes the sound was definitely from the boating traffic.
content.summary: 20 to 30 orange glowing lights moved south to north across the eastern horizon at 9 pm cdt.  uniform size, spaced out over a 15 minute period.  disappeared as the moved north.

content.detailedDescription: This is a series of orb sightings beginning about a month ago. i live between boeing field and seatac airport. im a lifelong aviation buff and these arent commercial aircraft. the normal traffic pattern around here is very low the planes are only a few hundred feet in this airspace. the time i see them is usually around 3 am. the first about a month ago was the closest. i was just standing out looking at the stars when one particlarly bright one caught my eye in the eastern sky.  i noticed it was moving west towards and over my house. it was very slow and glowed a very bright whitish blue. it flew west over my house. the object flew an erratic straight path. it pulsed in intensity and bounced around like a balloon on a string. the next night around midnight i saw 2 such orbs, much higher travelling south to north. these were weaving back and forth. again no flashing red light port starboard beacons or sound. these orbs im seeing almost every night i look now. the one tonight was at exactly 2:58 am. it came from the south again very high. it actually stopped and also did a series of aerobatic turns and then seemed like it was using a cloud to aalmost hide behind and peek around for lack of. these sightings are not known manned aircraft and also im seeing them in the same quadrant of the sky every night. these are in heavily trafficked airsace between 2 airports again however the commercial flights are very low to the ground over here.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In the last month including tonighr ive seen up to 7 maneuvering orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed about to fall asleep when i was awoken by a bright light. when i first saw the lights i thought it was a search helicopter. as i looked at it hovering, it started moving then the one light sudenly split into four more lights when this happened it slowly started moving upwards then it shot up into the sky very fast. after i lost sight from my bed i got up and ran over to my window where all i could see was a very small light floating into space like when you let go of a balloon. i lost sight initially from my window when the object shot up because of the size of my window, then i lost sight the second time because the object was so small i couldent see it anymore.
content.summary: Four lights hover then shoot up into the sky

content.detailedDescription: See bove
content.summary: Star like objects moving from south to north about 20-30 event lasted about 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was in myrtle beach shooting thunderstorms and turned my camera south to the buildings the get a better focus my lens to make sure i could catch the lighting sharp on my photos... took a few frames and turned the camera back out over the sea to shoot the building storms.. never seeing any thing but lighting the next morning going over my pictures i found one with 5 white dots or objects on it.. looking at the photo full size could not figure out what they were except ufos, not pixels blown out in my camera. just don't have an idea.. i don't know how i did not see them but the camera captured it.. just lost at how that happen
content.summary: I was shooting thunder storms and the next morning looking over photos found the lights on photo

content.detailedDescription: Just a warning that what i observed were obviously chinese lanterns just off of harvey road in claymont, delaware approaching midnight on 06/28/2014. saw candles burning in the two lowest ones approximately 20 to 40 feet above ground level as i was returning home from work in my car from i95. orange-reddish sort of orb-like when first seen.  suspected chinese lanterns, then confirmed it when i saw the lit candles in them.  kind of upset cause i know this will probably cause false ufo report(s).  lost behind trees.
content.summary: Chinese lanterns by unknown party 2 to 3 streets from me.   i could see the lit candles just off harvey rd.

content.detailedDescription: Was with family at our cottage on miner lake in waupaca county at about 9:15 pm when my daughter noticed what first looked like a chinese lantern in southwest sky moving due north.  i really didn't bother to look for it through the trees then she said there are two more.  i immediately went out on the dock and noticed two brightly shaped orange/yellow orb like likes (both staggered) but moving at exactly the same speed and direction under the clouds in a straight north direction over our lake.  they were below the cloud cover and i watched them for about two minutes moving without any noise whatsoever.  they then just faded out and that was the last i saw it.
content.summary: Saw total of three orange/yellow glowing orbs move in straightline

content.detailedDescription: Outside when saw 1st bright yellow amber light heading north, then a couple of minutes another, heading north, then another. all with out blinking lights like a plane and no sound.  close enough to ground to hear if there was an engine.
content.summary: 3 separate yellow lights heading north .

content.detailedDescription: I'm including a couple of extra photos of a craft that appears very similar to those covered in my last report.  i submitted five photos with my last, with each one shot on different days this year; 05/28, 05/29, 05/31, 06/02, and 06/11.  the two i'm including with this report were shot on 06/21 at about 7:05 pm.  must mention, for the sake of accuracy, that i've discovered photos taken with my video cam are time stamping the photos about 5 minutes earlier than when they were actually taken.  ok, the most important thing about this is that both photos were shot in sequence, one after the other. you'll see that both are time stamped within the same minute, but it's likely  these photos were taken not much more than 4 to 6 seconds apart. with the first photo i was aiming towards the southwest, and then i turned and aimed my next shot due west from the same spot. given the position of this ufo in each photo, it looks like this bugger was one fast motor scooter. since i've found that photos loaded here end up being shuffled and posted out of order, i've labeled the southwest photo a, the due west photo b, and have loaded them here in reverse order. perhaps they'll post in proper sequence this time. if not, a was shot before b, by about 4 to 6 seconds.  notice also the edge of the cloud on the far right side of photo a, and the edge of that same cloud in photo b. that should help to add some distance perspective.
content.summary: Two photos suggesting fast speed of ufo

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my house with family and a friend pn jine 27 2014. the men were playing a video game. i looked up and out my living room windoe and abive the houses across my street was somethinng cant explain. and trust me i tried! im usually very logical and i dont believe in things i cant see but this i saw. and it was big and clpse and seemed large and like it was watching something near me. i could
content.summary: Looked out my window and saw something large and unknown hovering straight ahead

content.detailedDescription: I was heading back from night shift. i actually seen a weird ripple in the sky kinda like a jet stream just a little different. i took several pictures. then today i was going through my phones gallary deleting photos and noticed a clear almost see through orb in the background with 6 lights. changing locations. i have photos but no video. the lights at one moment make a near perfect circle within what looks like a baige colored perfect circle. then they changed in another another picture still in the perfect circle but the lights were a sqaure instead.Perfect one. i made the picture larger to see more clearly what it was, thats when i discovered the lights/orbs. and it wasnt a reflection i rolled my window down and the orb was just above the lip.
content.summary: White transparent perfect circle with 5 to 6 white lights changing throughout circle

content.detailedDescription:
i saw, at 8:30 pm eastern standard time,  what i thought was a star brighter then all the others in the west sky about 65 degrees up and was watching it from our driveway in trenton ontario canada approximately 3 hours as it was so bright i thought it would go super nova, then i watched it streak off to the south west as it left it's position it had a short tail of light behind it about 3 times it's size it then disappeared behind a line of trees out of my sight i was driving by this time and could not get my phone to take pictures this was right around 11:45 pm eastern standard this sitting i had pointed out to 2 neighbours they saw the bright object around 9:30 pm eastern standard time but i was alone when i saw it fly south west 

time since this i have been trying to figure out what had happened i am a believer in other life forms, this incident also kicked in memories of 2 prior possible sittings 1 when i was a child probably 11 years old and 1 from age 23 years this 1 also in trenton ontario canada 3 blocks from where i live now
content.summary: Very bright white circular object resembled a star but allot brighter
